Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : Acetaminophen - induced ALF patients undergoing LT had a greater severity of pre - LT illness reflected by higher Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II scores and requirement for organ support compared with the other two groups .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acute Liver Failure (ALF) |
| Acetaminophen-induced ALF |
| Organ Support |

Note: "Acetaminophen-induced ALF" can be considered a single entity, as it refers to a specific type of Acute Liver Failure that is caused by Acetaminophen.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Acute Liver Failure (ALF) |
| Acetaminophen-induced ALF |

I removed "Organ Support" from the previous table as it doesn't clearly refer to a disease.
